description:
Bulk Rename Command (BRC) is a simple command-line utility which allows you to rename multiple files and folders, based upon flexible criteria. BRC is a natural alternative from my existing [Bulk Rename Utility](https://chocolatey.org/packages/bulkrenameutility) software, as it allows you to rename files without the use of a Graphical User Interface. 

This makes it ideally suited to batch environments and server environments, or where you need to rename files on a regular basis with the same requirements.
summary: Allows you to easily rename files and folders recursively based upon find-replace, character place, fields, sequences, regular expressions, EXIF data, and more.
author: Jim Willsher, TGRMN Software
